newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Dutch credit insurer NCM, Japan's EID/MITI in pact.
newsitem.headline: Dutch credit insurer NCM, Japan's EID/MITI in pact.

text.p: Dutch credit insurer Nederlandsche Credietverzekering Maatschappij NV (NCM) said on Monday it had signed a cooperation agreement with the Export, Import and Investment Insurance Department of Japan's Ministry of International Trade and Industry (EID/MITI).

"This enables Dutch exporters of capital goods and internationally active construction firms, which cooperate with Japanese firms as suppliers or partners in joint ventures, to insure their payment risks with EID/MITI," the unlisted Dutch group said in a statement.
EID/MITI will insure a maximum of 70 percent of the payment risks that Dutch firms have.
NCM said the agreement with its Japanese counterpart was an important incentive for further cooperation between Dutch and Japanese companies.
